articles.title: US announces $345 million military aid package for Taiwan - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. has announced a new $345 million military aid package for Taiwan. It is the Biden administration’s first major package drawing on America’s own stockpiles to help Taiwan counter China. Two U.S. officials tell The Associated Press that the package inc…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The U.S. on Friday announced $345 million in military aid for Taiwan, in what is the Biden administrations first major package drawing on Americas own stockpiles to help Taiwan counte… [+3102 chars]

articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: Ticks Are Giving Tons of Americans an Allergy to Red Meat - Gizmodo
articles.description: New CDC-led research has found that up to a half million people in the U.S. have developed alpha-gal syndrome from tick bites since 2010.
articles.content: Lots of Americans have had the potential joy of eating a juicy steak taken away from them by a measly tick, new research out this week has found. The study estimates that up to 450,000 people in the … [+4044 chars]

articles.title: Biden's DOT pushes tighter fuel efficiency rules for SUVs - POLITICO
articles.description: Sedans have already improved at a rapid clip, but SUVs and pickup trucks — which have become increasingly popular with American drivers — have “more room to improve,” the proposal said.
articles.content:
Republicans swiftly blasted the proposal.
It is another salvo in the war on affordable gas-powered cars and trucks, said Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas). This de facto EV mandate will dramatically raise car… [+6360 chars]
